text:
I had a line as follows in my schema:
<xsd:element name="key" type="keyType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="4096"/>
For this I get the following exception:
The exception goes away if I reduce the maxOccurs to say 3072. Also I get no 
exception if I make maxOccurs="unbound". Is there a limit to the number of 
maxOccurs??

java.lang.StackOverflowError
	at 
org.apache.xerces.validators.schema.TraverseSchema.findAndCreateElements
(TraverseSchema.java:8184)
	at 
org.apache.xerces.validators.schema.TraverseSchema.findAndCreateElements
(TraverseSchema.java:8184)
	at 
org.apache.xerces.validators.schema.TraverseSchema.findAndCreateElements
(TraverseSchema.java:8184)
creator: vgupta@us.ibm.com
vgupta@us.ibm.com
text: The error also occurs on xerces1.4.3
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3277 ***
creator: sandygao@ca.ibm.com
